pma:database.name: ncm
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `events` ( `dttm` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `description` longtext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `location` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `contact` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `callsign` varchar(7) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `email` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `url` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `start` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `end` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `domain` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `docType` varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `deletedBY` varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `deletedON` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `netkind` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `eventDate` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `subdomain` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_start` (`start`), KEY `idx_end` (`end`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=490 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `HPD` ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `county` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `state` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `District` tinytext, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=406 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `NetKind` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `call` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `org` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `orgType` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `dflt_kind` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `kindofnet` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `dflt_freq` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `freq` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `contact_call` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `contact_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `contact_email` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `org_web` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `comments` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `row1` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `row2` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `row3` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `row4` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `row5` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `row6` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `box4` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `box5` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `columnViews` varchar(75) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=106 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `NetLog` ( `row_number` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `recordID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `netID` int(6) NOT NULL, `subNetOfID` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `timeout` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `ID` int(4) unsigned zerofill NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000', `callsign` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `Fname` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `grid` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `traffic` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT '', `tactical` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `logdate` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT 'Check-in Date & Time', `activity` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT '', `latitude` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `longitude` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `Lname` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `netcontrol` varchar(3) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `active` varchar(7) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '', `frequency` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT '146.790, 107.2', `comments` varchar(3000) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `creds` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `timeonduty` int(8) DEFAULT '0', `netcall` varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `status` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `Mode` varchar(6) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `logclosedtime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `county` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `state` varchar(2) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `district` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `firstLogIn` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `tt` int(2) unsigned zerofill DEFAULT NULL, `pb` int(1) NOT NULL, `phone` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `dttm` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'When row was created', `ipaddress` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `band` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `w3w` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `home` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `cat` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'Custom', `section` varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'Section', PRIMARY KEY (`recordID`), KEY `callsign` (`callsign`), KEY `netID` (`netID`,`callsign`), KEY `id_netID` (`netID`,`ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=49941 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci COMMENT='Amateur Radio Net Check-in Log';

CREATE TABLE `poi` ( `id` int(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `netID` int(6) DEFAULT NULL, `class` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `Type` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `county` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `city` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `latitude` double NOT NULL, `longitude` double NOT NULL, `grid` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL, `altitude` int(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Altitude in Feet', `tactical` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `callsign` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `DGID` int(2) unsigned zerofill NOT NULL DEFAULT '00', `mode` varchar(25) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Digital', `Notes` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Notes/Contact', `latlng` point DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Spatial Point', UNIQUE KEY `primary index` (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=159 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `TimeLog` ( `uniqueID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `recordID` int(10) NOT NULL, `timestamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `ID` int(4) NOT NULL, `netID` int(6) NOT NULL, `callsign` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `comment` varchar(3000) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT NULL, `ipaddress` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`uniqueID`), KEY `netID` (`netID`), KEY `recordID` (`recordID`), KEY `netID_2` (`netID`,`callsign`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=66342 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
